name: Goat Detective Supah Star
storyline:
Help Detective Goatman solve the murder of a Supah K-Star! 
 
Everyone hides their secrets. Lick every clue on sight and track the devious murderer! What are you waiting for?
summary: A very tragic event has happened – a single member of a famous boy band has died, and you have been called in to figure out exactly what has happened.
